# OTelLogs

Logs emitted by an OpenTelemetry source.


## Table attributes

|Attribute|Value|

|**Resource types**|microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces|
|**Categories**|Applications|
|**Solutions**| LogManagement|
|**Basic log**|Yes|
|**Ingestion-time transformation**|Yes|
